### HideSlider enumeration
</br>


#### Represents the elements that can be hidden on a slider.

```csharp
[Flags]
public enum HideSlider
```

### Values

| name | value | description |
| --- | --- | --- |
| None | `0x0` | No elements are hidden. |
| Delimit | `0x1` | Hides the delimiters. |
| Range | `0x2` | Hides the range display. |
